UIManager - Class in engine.ui
Manages rendering and user interaction for the game UI, including inventory display, dialogue boxes, pause menu, crafting menu, and win screen.
UIManager(Inventory, List<Recipe>, List<NPC>, SaveLoadManager) - Constructor for class engine.ui.UIManager
Constructs a UIManager with the necessary game state and save manager.
update(double, World) - Method in class entity.NPC
Advances the NPC animation based on elapsed time.
